bill.summary:
Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to the Central Advent Christian Church of Alleghany County, Virginia, all interest of the United States in and to a parcel of real property in George Washington National Forest consisting of not more than eight acres, including a cemetery encompassing approximately six acres designated as an area of special use for the Church, as depicted on certain Forest Service maps.
Subjects such conveyance to the condition that the Church accept the real property in its condition at the time of conveyance, commonly known as conveyance "as is."
